trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_SEQ_00<tab>Debroye appears to have had a revelation.

TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_SEQ_01<tab>Debroye has tasked you with crafting jars of panaloaf yeast.
※Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 140. Delivering items with a rating of 290 or more will earn greater rewards.

TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_SEQ_02<tab>You deliver the panaloaf yeast to Debroye. As before, she asks for some time to cogitate on the problem at hand─a means to add a tantalizing aroma to the next batch of bread.
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_TODO_00<tab>Deliver jars of panaloaf yeast to Debroye.
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─my partner in panaloaf improvement!
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_100_000<tab>I've been researching the subject of texture, and I think I've found the cause of our powdery problem.
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_001<tab>The answer lies in the yeast. It seems the sugar content of the sweetener weakened its usual effects, preventing the dough from being fully leavened.
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_002<tab>Which means that if we can create a yeast more properly suited to sweetened dough, then our bread will be as moist as we care to make it!
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_003<tab>Knowing, however, is not quite the same as doing. While I understand the basics, formulating yeast from scratch is rather beyond my current abilities...
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_004<tab>Once more, I must call upon you to “rise” to the occasion! Ahem, sorry...
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_010<tab>I'm afraid our bread will never be all that it can be if we cannot solve this yeastly dilemma...
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_020<tab>Wonderful! If my reasoning is correct, then this yeast should be compatible with our sweet dough.
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_021<tab>Now this is some potent-looking yeast! Trust me, after the hours I spent staring at such things during my studies, the quality is obvious!
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_030<tab>Thanks to all your hard work, the third test batch of panaloaf turned out just as moist as we'd hoped!
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_100_030<tab>And all without compromising the original integrity of its nutritional content.
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_031<tab>It was well received by the clientele at the Last Stand, and even our difficult-to-please regular gave it his seal of approval.
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_032<tab>I would, however, like to hear the opinion of the─to my knowledge─foremost gourmand in Sharlayan.

TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_033<tab>I speak of Master Dickon, the owner of the Last Stand. Everything I know about gourmet cooking, I owe to that man. Come, why don't we go and see what he has to say?
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_034<tab>Master Dickon, what did you think of the third batch?
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DICKON_000_035<tab>Aye, it's a decent loaf, alright.

TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DICKON_000_036<tab>Certainly a far cry from what you started with─that very first sample tasted like a sponge fished out of a sewer ditch. I expect you have your new friend to thank for this sudden leap in progress...?
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_A1_000_001<tab>Debroye's efforts made all the difference!
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_A1_000_002<tab>I swore a vendetta against that foul-tasting evil!
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_037<tab>I could hardly have done it alone! Without your practical talents, I would still be stuck daydreaming by the oven.
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_038<tab>Oh, my dear <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you are a gourmet after my own heart─a crusader for culinary quality!

TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DICKON_000_039<tab>Be that as it may, you yet have work to do. You've worked wonders with the taste and the texture, but there's no <var 1A 02 /var>aroma<var 1A 01 /var>. It needs a savory scent to draw you in, and set your mouth to watering.
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_040<tab>So it isn't...smelly enough.
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_041<tab>The road to gastronomic excellence is never-ending, it seems. But if that is what it takes to earn your full approval, then we must bake on!
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DICKON_000_042<tab>Ah, you remind me of old Mervyn. He was the fellow who built this place, and dedicated his life to bringing fine food to Sharlayan.

TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DICKON_000_043<tab>That life ended before he'd truly accomplished his goal, and the Last Stand passed on to me. Even now, gourmet cooking remains something of a foreign concept in this nation.

TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DICKON_000_044<tab>It's the kind of place where puffed-up experts like your professor label their nutritional experiments the “perfect meal.” As if anything with such a revolting flavor could ever be deemed perfect!

TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DICKON_000_045<tab>Listen, the Last Stand was named so for a reason. We're a cultural outpost─the final defense against those who would condemn Sharlayan's diet to blandness and monotony!
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DICKON_100_045<tab>If you share Mervyn's dream─and I believe you do─then I implore you to carry on his legacy!
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_046<tab>After hearing what Master Dickon had to say, I'm more determined than ever to make a truly perfected panaloaf!
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_DEBROYE_000_047<tab>As before, allow me some time to cogitate on the problem, and then we can see about adding a tantalizing aroma to the next batch of bread.
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_SYSTEM_000_048<tab>Debroye is delighted with your efforts. She now considers you an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Indispensable Baker<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_AKTKLA303_04148_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>The next quest will be available from Debroye upon reaching level 85 as an alchemist or culinarian.
